Plot: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
Title: Superbad
Actors: Jonah Hill, Michael Cera, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Bill Hader
tomatoConsensus: Deftly balancing vulgarity and sincerity while placing its protagonists in excessive situations, Superbad is an authentic take on friendship and the overarching awkwardness of the high school experience.
